channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [added] Privileged Access Gateway (privileged-access-gateway)
item.description: Controls and monitors secure operator access to remotely administer servers and clusters.

item.title: [updated] API Connect (apiconnect) has changed the description of the plan named reserved-instance-fixed
item.description:
*before*: A single-tenant, single-zone deployment of API Connect with multi-zone high availability options available. Leverage IBM Cloud services for common tasks like identity management, monitoring, auditing, and logging. Includes the management, gateway, analytics, and portal server components, as well as tools for registering and managing existing gateways located on-premises and on third-party clouds.
This plan is only available for customers who have purchased API Connect through the sales office and have received an activation code.
Contact your sales representative for more information., *after*: This plan is only available for customers who have already purchased API Connect Reserved from IBM or an authorized business partner. Contact your sales representative for more information.
IBM Cloud subscription credits can not be applied to purchase API Connect Reserved.
Provides a single-tenant deployment of API Connect with optional multi-zone region high availability option available. Leverage IBM Cloud services for common tasks like identity management, monitoring, auditing, and logging. Includes the management, gateway, analytics, and developer portal components, as well as tools for registering existing self-managed gateways located on-premises and on third-party clouds.

item.title: [added] MinIO (minio)
item.description: MinIO offers high-performance, S3 compatible object storage. Native to Kubernetes, compatible with every public cloud.
